transcript.title: THE MINISTRY - 14 JULY 1975
transcript.content:
Press Statement No. 530
14 July 1975
THE MINISTRY
The Prime Minister, Mr Whitlam, tonight announced
a change in the Ministry. The change follows the election
of Mr J. M. Berinson, to the Ministry at the Caucus
Meeting of the Australian Labor Party that was held in
Canberra earlier today.
The Prime Minister said that the Governor-General
had tonight sworn-in Mr Berinson as Minister for Environment.
CANBERRA, A. C. T.
